titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: SOCIO-ECONOMIC CLASSIFICATION CODE FOR STOP SMOKING - Description

body.p: The SOCIO-ECONOMIC CLASSIFICATION codes are based on the Office for National Statistics socio-economic classification for a Stop Smoking Service . TermServer
Further information on mapping can be found on the National Centre for Smoking Cessation and Training website at Local Stop Smoking Services: Service and Delivery Guidance 2014 .
